summary: Thieves encountered randomly in cities now drop armor.
descriptionHtml:
!!! May not work with latest Skyrim version !!!

After several requests and months of \"Oh screw it I can\'t be arsed to make mod for that\" -lazying, here it is: Randomly encountered thieves drop the standard Thieves Guild armor set! The ones in cities I mean. Some other npcs wearing the hood might now drop theirs too.

That\'s it, that\'s all the mod does! Enjoy! :)

And be sure to check my Dark Brotherhood equivalent mod here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18425
author: Kuunkulta
